topMentions.text: Rain Maker secures $45M Series C led by Andreessen Horowitz for expansion into Middle East markets
Nevada regulators approve expanded cloud seeding zones for @RainmakerCorp. Operations begin March 2026.
Senate Committee on Environment hearing scheduled for March 12 to discuss cloud seeding regulation. @RainmakerCorp invited to testify.
Cloud seeding companies like @RainmakerCorp are stealing rain from downwind communities. This needs federal regulation NOW.
Anyone dismissing cloud seeding hasn't looked at @RainmakerCorp's peer-reviewed data. This isn't 1960s silver iodide anymore.
@ADoricko's presentation at WaterTech Summit was outstanding. Rain Maker is solving a real problem with real science.
Rain Maker's claims are wildly overstated. Their own data shows marginal precipitation increases at best.
Bureau of Reclamation partners with @RainmakerCorp on pilot program for Colorado River basin precipitation enhancement.
Rain Maker's Q4 results show 23% increase in precipitation yield. This is the future of water security. $RAIN
Western drought worsens — states increasingly turn to cloud seeding firms like @RainmakerCorp for solutions.
New study in Nature Water evaluates commercial cloud seeding efficacy. @RainmakerCorp's technology among those assessed.
We deployed @RainmakerCorp's system across 3 counties. Early data: 15-20% rainfall increase in target zones.
Just visited @RainmakerCorp's demo site in Nevada — the results are genuinely impressive.
Who gave @RainmakerCorp the right to modify weather patterns? This affects everyone downstream.
